description.title: A Peaceful Escape in the Heart of Marrakech
description.paragraph1: Located in the heart of Marrakech, Riad Deluxe combines traditional Moroccan architecture with modern comfort. It offers an ideal sanctuary to escape the city noise with its spacious courtyard, refreshing pool, and peaceful gardens. Each room is meticulously decorated, reflecting the richness of Moroccan craftsmanship.
description.paragraph2: Our hotel is within walking distance of all major tourist attractions, providing easy access to Djemaa el-Fna Square and the souks of the Medina. Guests can relax in our traditional Moroccan hammam or enjoy a mint tea on our rooftop terrace with panoramic city views.
description.roomFeature1: Meticulously decorated, comfortable rooms and luxurious suites.
description.roomFeature2: Each room includes a private bathroom, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and a flat-screen TV.
description.roomFeature3: Traditional Moroccan craftsmanship and modern amenities.
description.localTip1: Visit Djemaa el-Fna Square and try local food stalls for dinner.
description.localTip2: Get lost in the narrow streets of the Medina and find handmade products.

reviews.title: Guest Reviews ({count})
reviews.user1Comment: It was a wonderful experience! The hotel's location is magnificent, the staff is very attentive, and the rooms were spotless. I will definitely stay again.
reviews.user2Comment: The hotel is very stylish, it truly brings the Moroccan atmosphere to life. Breakfast could have been more varied, but overall we were very satisfied.

map.title: Hotel Location
map.officeAddress1: Bertance Boulevard, Sevin Apartment No:64 D:11
